item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a software engineering student (final year), working with Java mainly and playing with Go. I love backend, writing SAAS, using cloud technologies and discrete math. The topics in software engineering I am the most passionate about is Software Architecture and Software design (i.e. beautiful code). I am currently taking graduate classes at Concordia University in Artifical Inteligence because this domain brings the gap between great fields in mathematics and programing I took the following classes:

item.title: My First Post
item.description: My first Post I do not have much interesting to say for now, at least worthy of a blog post, but, if you are looking for great mathematical puzzles and enigmas, contact me!
